ai-mil7.5.5:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when there was a royal family circle of Nāgas, a barber, what would you do?”
ai-mil7.5.5:1.2_0: “Just as a stream-enterer came to the neighborhood of a Wheel-turning Mount Nakula’s body.
ai-mil7.5.5:1.3_0: In the same way, when you’re riches, affluent, and wealthy, with lots of property and assets, oppressed by conceit, you should contempt with you from the femininity of worldly pleasures.
ai-mil7.5.5:1.4_0: This is the one of the family.
ai-mil7.5.5:1.5_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.5.5:2.2_0: he should develop the recollection of development.
ai-mil7.5.5:2.4_0: this is the instruction of the Buddhas.’”
ai-mil7.5.5:3.1_0: The fifth (first) is the fifth (common) birth.
